name: Vanilla Coconut Fine Sugar Scrub 14.2 oz
description:
Perfect for those that prefer a more gentle exfoliation or have sensitive skin. Made with fine sugar for a gentle exfoliation, along with shea butter and safflower oil to hydrate and soften skin.

Ingredients: sugar, shea butter, safflower oil, silica, polysorbate 80, vitamin e, phenoxyethanol, fragrance oil.

name: Slick Devil Pomade 4 oz.- Five Pack* Always free shipping in the US*
description:
Purchase five pomades and save 20%
For the Men: Comb it, spike it, slick it back! 
For the Ladies: Create smooth, polished updo styles and tame those fly aways!
A little goes a long way!
Water soluble, doesn't flake, easy to rinse out, easy to re-comb, semi-matte finish, firm hold hairstyling pomade with a clean light scent of tobacco flower and vanilla perfect for both men and women.
Directions: Emulsify in hands, apply, then style. Best used on dry hair or almost dry for your slick backs.

Made in the USA
Tested on friends and family NOT on animals.
For external use only

Ingredients: water, ceteareth-25, polyvinylpyrrolidone, PEG-7 glyceryl cocoate, PEG-40 hydrogenated castor oil, glycerin, beeswax, benzophenone-4, DMDM hydantoin, PEG-8 dimethicone, polysorbate-20, fragrance parfum.

name: Coffee Coconut Exfoliating Sea Salt Body Scrub 14.2 oz
description:
If you're a coffee lover you will love this! 
We mixed the energizing fragrance of coffee with the sweet scent of coconut. 
Ingredients: fine sea salt and coffee grinds to give you the perfect amount of exfoliation, coconut oil and kukui nut oil to hydrate skin. A perfect ratio of exfoliation and oil.
For maximum freshness use within 6 months of purchase.
Directions: Use on damp skin and rinse thoroughly.
Caution: Oil in product may make shower or tub surfaces slippery. Do not use right after shaving may cause skin irritation.

Tested on friends and family NOT on animals
For external use only
